fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Motivation: Whenever you Kill a player, draw 1 satcheled card. 
- Resupply: The first time you empty your hand, draw 3 cards immediately.
- Threats: Learn how many players you do not win with within a +/- 3 radius from you on the playerlist. Influenceable. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Holy Power: Pick a player. If they do not win with you, Impale?! them at the end of the phase. Influenceable. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3]  
- Divination: Turn all cards in your hand into random attacking cards, keeping the modifiers. [1 use, Unique] 
- Aggression: Change a card in your hand into a non-special attacking card of your choice. Gains a use every 3 players you outlive. [2 uses, 2 CD, Recharging, 0/3]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all Chaos and Outsiders who oppose your goal.
